item.title: HAPPENING NOW: Local leaders are holding a town hall on a ne
item.description: HAPPENING NOW: Local leaders are holding a town hall on a new program to lower energy costs and help Arizonans manage extreme heat.

item.title: Namibia, a country in southern Africa, said it is planning t
item.description: Namibia, a country in southern Africa, said it is planning to kill over 700 wild animals including elephants and hippos to distribute the meat to its citizens struggling to secure food as the country deals with an ongoing drought.

item.title: This is the largest listeriosis outbreak since 2011, the CDC
item.description: This is the largest listeriosis outbreak since 2011, the CDC says.
